# Tender Announcement
## PASS-SA Stream #1 - Internal Audit and PASS-SA Stream #3 - Information Technology and Systems Audit
### Reference Number
PW-23-01020723

### Publication Date
2023-01-10

### Closing Date
2023-02-07T14:00:00

### Amendment Number
1

### Solicitation Number
ECFT-RFP-2022-1460

### Description
[The Government of Canada] is seeking professional services for internal audits in accordance with the Risk-Based Audit Plan. The proposed services will be for internal audits on an as-and-when basis. 

### Categories
Stream 1 - Internal Audit Services:
- 1 Senior Auditor
- 1 Auditor

Stream 3 - Information Technology and Systems Audit:
- 1 Auditor

### Duration
The contract period will be from the Effective Date of the Contract until March 31, 2024 (the “Initial Term”). Options to extend the period of the Contract by three additional periods of 1-year each under the same terms and conditions will also be available.

### Requirements
The contractor must fulfill the security requirements stated in the Risk-Based Audit Plan. A minimum corporate security level of DOS – Reliability and a minimum resource security level of Reliability status are required.

### Bid Submission Process
Proposals must be submitted electronically using the epost Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation. Bidders must refer to the complete RFP document for a full description of the requirement and the full bid instructions.

### Contact Information
Francine Touchette
proposal-proposal@elections.ca
30 Victoria Street, 1st Floor (Business Centre), Gatineau, QC J9X 4H7

### Languages
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Important Notes
* Tenderers will be selected based on a competitive procurememnt strategy that sees the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
* Pre-qualified suppliers are eligible to bid.
* The government retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* The Bidder's primary contact will be the Contracting Authority.
